thread.title: Probe into Valencia Farmer's murder, gang rape completed
thread.title_full: Probe into Valencia Farmer's murder, gang rape completed | News24

author: news24.com
title: Probe into Valencia Farmer's murder, gang rape completed
text:
Cape Town - The investigation into the alleged role of Elmario Maasdorp in the brutal death of Valencia Farmer has been completed, the State has confirmed.
Maasdorp appeared in the Blue Downs Magistrate's Court on Friday on charges of murder and rape for the killing of the 14-year-old in 1999.
The accused, a father of two, last month decided not to apply for bail and after initially opting to conduct his own defence, he has since applied for legal representation.
Farmer was attacked after being led to an abandoned house in Eucalyptus Street, Eersterivier, on June 26, 1999. She was raped, repeatedly stabbed and her throat was slit.
